entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries early this afternoon. Clearing this afternoon. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 10 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Thursday 29 December 2022
